alert.note: Alert for Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 3:28PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Albany County through 400 PM MDT... At 327 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over University Of Wyoming War Memorial Stadium, or over Laramie. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Motorists should also be prepared for significantly reduced visibilities and hail accumulating on roadways. Locations impacted include... Laramie and University Of Wyoming War Memorial Stadium. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 312 and 319. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
